name: Untitled Giraffe Game
description:
Game made for Global Game Jam 2020 and created by:

Programming: Anthony Lehenbauer, Jonathan Ribarro

Art: Ethan Welsh, Isaac Frias

Music: Kevin Macleod

Link to game on GGJ website: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/untitled-giraffe-game-1

In this game, you play as a construction worker who has to stop a giraffe from destroying a whole building! Repair windows, catch hammers, and throw them back to advance! Gamepads are recommended.

Keyboard controls: 

Throw - C key/L key

 Catch - K key/X key

 Jump - Space bar 

Repair - J key/Z key
